document.full_text: democratic rep. gabrielle giffords' staff released plans on friday for her visit to florida to watch the launch of the space shuttle mission skippered by her husband mark kelly later this month.
document.title: giffords' office releases plans for shuttle launch visit
lines_and_colors: democratic rep. gabrielle giffords' staff released plans on friday for her visit to florida to watch the launch of the space shuttle mission skippered by her husband mark kelly later this month.
